Lyric:
[00:05.480]I used to bite my tongue and hold my breath 
[00:08.110]Scared to rock the boat and make a mess 
[00:10.770]So I sat quietly, agreed politely 
[00:16.100]I guess that I forgot I had a choice 
[00:18.770]I let you push me past the breaking point 
[00:21.520]I stood for nothing, so I fell for everything 
[00:26.620]You held me down, but I got up 
[00:29.330]Already brushing off the dust 
[00:31.860]You hear my voice, your hear that sound 
[00:34.870]Like thunder, gonna shake your ground 
[00:37.270]You held me down, but I got up 
[00:40.160]Get ready cause I've had enough 
[00:42.460]I see it all, I see it now 
[00:45.860]I got the eye of the tiger, the fire, dancing through the fire 
[00:52.890]Cause I am a champion and you're gonna hear me ROAR 
[00:59.860]Louder, louder than a lion 
[01:03.460]Cause I am a champion and you're gonna hear me ROAR 
[01:10.400]Oh oh oh oh oh oh 
[01:17.420]You're gonna hear me roar 
[01:22.940]Now I'm floating like a butterfly 
[01:25.460]Stinging like a bee I earned my stripes 
[01:28.130]I went from zero, to my own hero 
[01:33.040]You held me down, but I got up 
[01:35.730]Already brushing off the dust
